page.title: 08TOURISM AROUND EASSIE
page.content: Eassie is in an excellent position to offer the tourist many places to visit. There are about ten holiday cottages in our area, which are used all summer. From Eassie visitors may go to Dundee or Perth or explore the Angus glens - Glens Prosen, Clova and Isla. Glamis Castle, childhood home of the Queen Mother, is only 3 miles away and guided tours take place throughout the summer. There is also a very good museum in Glamis village. Visitors can also come to Eassie in winter as the Glenshee ski grounds are only an hour's drive away. Shooting parties are arranged in the Eassie area during the pheasant shooting season.
